entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High 22. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
